pullrequest.title: Update to protobuf3 and fix compiler warnings

content.raw:
Pipelines is fixed:  [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/addon/pipelines/home#!/results/1115](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/addon/pipelines/home#!/results/1115)

The solution is to install into `/usr` instead of `/usr/lib`. Seems like a reasonable solution. This is the same location debs use.
content.html:
Pipelines is fixed: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/addon/pipelines/home#!/results/1115

The solution is to install into /usr instead of /usr/lib. Seems like a reasonable solution. This is the same location debs use.
